item.title: Unforgettable event awaits in country's history, says Salahuddin
item.description: BNP Standing Committee member Salahuddin Ahmed has said an unforgettable event is going to take place in the country's 55-year history with the return of Tarique Rahman. He said BNP Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman's return to the country is a historic and outstanding moment in the Bangladesh's demo

item.title: Tarique to contest election from Bogura-6
item.description: The BNP has announced that its Acting Chairman, Tarique, will contest the 13th national election from the Bogura-6 (Sadar) constituency, a seat previously held by his mother, former prime minister Khaleda Zia. After returning to Bangladesh, Tarique is expected to complete voter registration, pavin

item.title: Tarique's schedule for the first three days back home
item.description: Thursday The flight carrying BNP leader Tarique Rahman landed at Dhaka's Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport at 11:11 am. From the airport, he will travel to the 300 Feet Road in Purbachal, where a reception has been organised, reports bdnews24.com. After the reception, he will go to Evercare

item.title: Cold wave felt in Dhaka as temperature drops to seasonal low
item.description: Dhaka experienced a marked spell of winter on Thursday as dense fog and cold winds swept across the capital from early morning, intensifying the chill that had so far been more pronounced in rural areas. The city recorded a minimum temperature of 14.2 degrees Celsius on Thursday (December 25), the

item.title: Christmas being celebrated across country
item.description: The Christmas Day commemorating the birthday of Jesus Christ is being celebrated today with religious fervour and festivity across the country, as elsewhere in the world. Special prayers are being offered at churches, which are illuminated for the occasion, while makeshift Christmas trees are set

item.title: BNP senior leaders welcome Tarique at Dhaka airport
item.description: Senior leaders of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) on Thursday welcomed the party’s Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman upon his arrival in Dhaka after a decade and a half in exile. The party Secretary General Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir and members of the party’s standing committee g

item.title: Tarique leaves for 300 feet area from airport
item.description: BNP Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman left Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport on Thursday afternoon for the reception venue in 300 feet area in a bulletproof bus. The bus carrying Tarique Rahman and others departed the airport for the reception venue at 12:40 pm, where he is scheduled to briefly

item.title: Chattogram Royals owners withdraw on eve of BPL over unpaid dues
item.description: The owners of Chattogram Royals have relinquished control of the franchise just a day before the start of the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL). They failed to meet financial obligations to players, leaving BCB to step in and take temporary charge of the team. The franchise owner, Abdul Kaiyum, inf

item.title: Tarique calls Yunus from airport
item.description: BNP leader Tarique Rahman spoke by phone with Chief Advisor Muhammad Yunus shortly after landing in Dhaka. During the conversation, Tarique thanked the interim government for the arrangements made for his return, particularly the security measures, reports bdnews24.com. “On my behalf and on

item.title: Tarique emotionally touches Bangladesh soil barefoot
item.description: Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman on Thursday made an emotional touch to Bangladesh soil barefoot at the airport after he was accorded a warm reception and emotional greetings there on arrival from London. He touched down on the soil with dew-dropped grasses barefoo

item.title: ‘Party on the wrong path’: NCP leader announces resignation on Facebook
item.description: Mir Arshadul Hoque, the chief coordinator of the National Citizen Party’s (NCP) Chattogram Metropolitan unit, has announced his resignation in a statement on social media. In a Facebook post on Thursday, Arshadul announced that he was stepping down from all positions within the party. He als

item.title: Tarique with his pet cat, Jebu, in Bangladesh
item.description: Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman's pet cat, Jebu, accompanied him to Bangladesh today upon his arrival at Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.
